title: Script caps in monogram
content:
Hi all,

I would appreciate your help in identifying the typeface used in this monogram. Thanks!

Marc

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416163703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/monogram_3503.jpg)
author: marcox

comments.content:
Monogram initials are almost always from special fonts, because vertical ornate initials are just not normally in script fonts. Did you look at Harold Lohner's monogram fonts? (also found at Font Bros). I am using a computer with a dead mouse, so I can't easily connect links -- sorry.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks for the lead, Mike -- I'll take a look.

Not sure that this is a specialized monogram font, though. The fit 'n' finish seems a bit unpolished.

Marc

Nevertheless, I think his Vine Monogram is similar, as I recall it.

- Mike Yanega
